results.title: Efficacy and safety of lisinopril for mild childhood IgA nephropathy: a pilot study.
authors: Japanese Pediatric IgA Nephropathy Treatment Study Group
results.text_hl: We conclude that the efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ is seemingly acceptable for the treatment of children with mild @<m>DISEASE_Job_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007589 @@@IgA-N

citations.NLM: Nakanishi K, Iijima K, Ishikura K, Hataya H, Awazu M, Sako M, Honda M, Yoshikawa N, Japanese Pediatric IgA Nephropathy Treatment Study Group. Efficacy and safety of lisinopril for mild childhood IgA nephropathy: a pilot study. Pediatr Nephrol. 2009 Apr;24(4):845-9. PMID: 18825420
